criteria.exclusion_criteria: 1. Diagnosed of having an Chronic Myeloid Leukemia; 2. Participates in a concurrent interventional clinical trial (phase 1, 2 or 3 or a Compassionate Use or Early Access Program).

primary_outcome.prim_outcome: Survival and proliferation in vitro;IL8 expression level;Efflux rate of chemotherapeutic agents;apoptosis rate;Expression levels of cell cycle and apoptosis related proteins;Adipogenic and osteogenic differentiation;Expression profile of IL8 related genes;
